content.query:
SELECT TOP 10
o.customeridname
, o.estimatedclosedate
, o.name
, o.description
, o.stepname
, o.emailaddress
, o.parentcontactidname
, o.closeprobability
, t.total_amount
 FROM [dataverse_salestrial_unqdfe7c1c9b353423988c2d52f8ae54].[dbo].[opportunity] o
 INNER JOIN [NYC].[dbo].[NYCTripSmall] t on o.opportunityratingcode = t.payment_type
